page.title: 11THE VILLAGE & PARISH OF N.
page.content: THE VILLAGE AND PARISH OF NORTH SOMERCOTES ENJOY THE FOLLOWING FACILITIES YOUTH CLUB -THREE TIMES A WEEK FREQUENT BINGO SESSIONS FOR FUND RAISING IN THE VILLAGE HALL AND THE CHURCH HALL. SNOOKER AT THE VILLAGE INSTITUTE. BROWNIES AND GUIDES,CUBS AND SCOUTS. WOMEN'S INSTITUTE. CLUBS FOR KARATE, FOOTBALL,CRICKET,BOWLS,TENNIS OLD TIME DANCING AND DISCOS AT THREE WEEKLY INTERVALS FOR YOUNG TEENAGERS AND ORGANISED BY THE JBHS PTA. PLAYGROUP.MEALS ON WHEELS FOR THE ELDERLY. THREE SWIMMING POOLS BUT ONLY ONE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC - THE ONE AT JOHN BIRKBECK HIGH SCHOOL WHERE AN ASSOCIATION HAS BEEN SET UP TO FACILITATE THIS.LARGE PLAYING FIELD WHICH IS SCENE OF ANNUAL CARNIVAL WHICH INCLUDES VEG. AND PRODUCE SHOW
